These Scholar Athletes:
1. Must be a New Hampshire high school senior.
2. Must have a B+ average throughout high school career.
3. Must letter and be currently active in at least two NHIAA recognized sports during their High school years.
4. Must be a positive role model who has participated in Community Service activities.

Congratulations to this year's Scholar Athletes!
